Posts.EditableText: I am currently unable to create, preview, or update any Squiffy game. I tried making a new Quest game assuming it was only an issue with Squiffy but that didn't work either. Someone else posted about this and the error seems to still be there.
Posts.HTML: I am currently unable to create, preview, or update any Squiffy game. I tried making a new Quest game assuming it was only an issue with Squiffy but that didn't work either. Someone else posted about this and the error seems to still be there.

Posts.EditableText: This is a problem that's still occurring to all creators. We're all on a creation hiatus until either Squiffy figures this stuff out or we migrate to the desktop version (ew). Hopefully, they're on it. But I do miss making games here...

Posts.EditableText: All I can say is that I have told Luis, and he has looked at it. It is not somethinng seen before, so will take some trouble-shooting. Hopefully he will find time to do that over the holiday.
